# [Interview #980: Waygate Foundation Q&A, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=980#4)

#### Question

Will the Tinkers ever find their song?

#### Maria Simons

According to Robert Jordan, no, the Tinkers will never find their song.
